# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/), and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2025-11-10
### Added
- Initial Veox API and model scaffold with `fit`, `predict`, `save`, and `status`.
- JSON persistence utilities with robust error handling.
- Pytest coverage, GitLab CI pipeline, and developer shell scripts for testing, building, and publishing.
- DOUG submission helper with urllib-based transport and dummy server regression test.
